title: Mount Rainier National Park: Northwest Area
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Trails     Northwest Area                 Northwest Area Trails        Tolmie Peak Fire Lookout perches on top of lava ridge cliffs. Photo taken July 20, 2013.
